title: Unlocking photovoltaic potential: leveraging unique diazo multimembered ring acceptors
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,7895-7907
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02841D, Paper
Mingpeng Li, Waqar Ali Memon, Shilong Xiong, Yafei Ding, Yunpeng Wang, Heng Li, Jingwen Si, Leilei Tian, Feng He
Effects of building blocks bearing various diazo-multimembered rings on NFAsâ€™ molecular properties and photovoltaic performance were systematically investigated. Among, PM6:7C-2F-based OSCs delivered a champion PCE of 18.83% with superior stability.
